thread.title: BRIEF-Prothena Announces Global Neuroscience Research & Development Collaboration With Celgene

title: BRIEF-Prothena Announces Global Neuroscience Research & Development Collaboration With Celgene

organizations.name: brief-prothena announces global neuroscience research & development
& development collaboration with celgene reuters staff

text: March 20, 2018 / 8:25 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Prothena Announces Global Neuroscience Research & Development Collaboration With Celgene Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Prothena Corporation Plc: * PROTHENA ANNOUNCES GLOBAL NEUROSCIENCE RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT COLLABORATION WITH CELGENE FOR NOVEL THERAPIES FOR PATIENTS WITH NEURODEGENERATIVE DISEASES * PROTHENA CORPORATION - PROTHENA TO RECEIVE A $100 MILLION UPFRONT PAYMENT AND A $50 MILLION EQUITY INVESTMENT BY CELGENE * PROTHENA CORPORATION- COLLABORATION INCLUDES POTENTIAL LICENSE PAYMENTS, MILESTONES, PLUS ADDITIONAL ROYALTIES ON SALES FROM LICENSED PROGRAMS FOR CO * PROTHENA CORPORATION PLC - CELGENE WILL SUBSCRIBE TO ABOUT 1.2 MILLION OF PROTHENAâ€™S ORDINARY SHARES AT $42.57 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
